abstract: Standard & Poor’s did not predict an all-out crisis, as it believed most governments would eventually take steps to slim down retirement programs.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s did not predict an all-out crisis, as it believed most governments would eventually take steps to slim down retirement programs.
lead_paragraph: Credit analysts at Standard & Poor’s said on Thursday that the cost of caring for the world’s aging populations would be “on an explosive path” and could swamp the budgets of many countries in the next 40 years unless governments accelerated belt-tightening efforts that are already proving highly unpopular.

headline.main: S.&P. Says Cost to Care for Elderly Will Spiral
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Says Cost to Care For Elderly Will Spiral

abstract: Mitchells stores, a Connecticut clothier to hedge funds and corporate chiefs, sees its California counterpart as the path to growth, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: Mitchells stores, a Connecticut clothier to hedge funds and corporate chiefs, sees its California counterpart as the path to growth, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Mitchells stores , a Connecticut clothier to hedge funds and corporate chiefs, prospered with Wall Street until the financial crisis battered sales. Now, the group sees its California counterpart as the path to growth, Bloomberg News reports.
